allow: Bash(for f in tools/dashboard/static/js/tour.js tools/dashboard/static/js/live.js tools/dashboard/static/js/batch.js tools/dashboard/static/js/shortcuts.js)
Bash(# Check which tool module subdirectories lack ANY test coverage # Identify unique top-level module directories find /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/tools -maxdepth 1 -type d)
Bash(# Check dashboard app.py for /admin route - referenced in templates grep -n ""admin\\|Admin"" /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/tools/dashboard/app.py)
Bash(# Check for missing routes in dashboard - /admin/users referenced in nav but check if it exists grep -n ""admin/users\\|/admin"" /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/tools/dashboard/api/admin.py)
Bash(# Check if there''s any GitHub Actions CI config find /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev -path ""*/\\.github/workflows/*.yml"" -o -path ""*/\\.github/workflows/*.yaml"")
Bash(# Check Helm templates for completeness vs 15 agents + dashboard + API gateway mentioned in CLAUDE.md cat /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/deploy/helm/templates/deployment.yaml)
Bash(# Check docs/ for structure find /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/docs -name ""*.md"" -o -name ""*.txt"" -o -name ""*.rst"")
Bash(# Check features BDD directory find /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/features -name ""*.feature"")

Bash(# Check saas/portal templates for anything referenced in nav but missing # Nav has: dashboard, projects, compliance, team, settings, api_keys, usage, cmmc, audit # Templates present: api_keys, audit, cmmc, compliance, dashboard, login, portal_base, projects, settings, team, usage # Check if any pages in nav link to something not in templates grep ""url_for"" /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/tools/saas/portal/templates/portal_base.html)
Bash(# Check scaffolder.py TODOs - are they in generated content or the tool itself? grep -n ""# TODO\\|# FIXME"" /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/tools/builder/scaffolder.py)

Bash(# CLAUDE.md mentions 15 agents: Orchestrator\(8443\), Architect\(8444\), Builder\(8445\), Compliance\(8446\), # Security\(8447\), Infrastructure\(8448\), MBSE\(8451\), Modernization\(8452\), Requirements Analyst\(8453\), # Supply Chain\(8454\), Simulation\(8455\), Knowledge\(8449\), DevSecOps&ZTA\(8457\), Gateway\(8458\), Monitor\(8450\) # Dockerfiles cover: agent-base, api-gateway, dashboard, devsecops-agent, gateway-agent, integration-agent # mbse-agent, modernization-agent, requirements-analyst-agent, simulation-agent, supply-chain-agent # Missing Dockerfiles for: Orchestrator, Architect, Builder, Compliance, Security, Infrastructure, Knowledge, Monitor # Now compare k8s manifests vs Dockerfiles ls /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/k8s/)

Bash(# Verify which k8s deployments correspond to which Dockerfiles # Check the orchestrator/architect/builder/compliance/security/infra/knowledge/monitor deployments # to see which Docker image they use grep -h ""image:\\|component:"" /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/k8s/orchestrator-deployment.yaml /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/k8s/architect-deployment.yaml /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/k8s/builder-deployment.yaml /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/k8s/compliance-deployment.yaml /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/k8s/security-deployment.yaml /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/k8s/knowledge-deployment.yaml /c/Users/schuo/Downloads/ICDev/k8s/monitor-deployment.yaml)
